note.p: Death: His lodgings, North Parade, Bath, Somerset (01 July 1789)
Education: School at Canterbury, Kent; St John's College, Cambridge; BA (1742/3), MA (1746); Incorporated at Oxford (1760); DD (Lambeth 1782)

Career: Fellow of St John's (1746-1751); Ordained deacon (1748), priest (1748/9); Vicar of Calne, Wiltshire (1749-1753); Headmaster of King's School, Canterbury (1750-1782); Vicar of Littlebourne, Kent (1753); Vicar of Milton (1764); Perpetual Curate of Iwade (1766); Six Preacher (1773)
